properties.Name: FinancialProductHeldByLegalEntity
properties.Description: The quantity of associated financial product held as investments on the indicated date with the estimated book value amount.

Columns.Name: LegalEntityId
Columns.Description:
The unique identifier of a Legal Entity.

In this case it is the business, organization or legal entity whose books are being recorded and financial statements presented.

Columns.Name: FinancialProductId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Financial Product.

Columns.Name: Timestamp
Columns.Description: The timestamp that the associated information is valid or effective as-of.

Columns.Name: LongQuantity
Columns.Description: The quantity of the financial product held long.

Columns.Name: ShortQuantity
Columns.Description: The quantity of the financial product held short.

Columns.Name: MarketValueAmount
Columns.Description: The market value of the financial product held.
